title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-5.5 - Examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-5.5 - Examination

State Regulations

The cost of examinations, consultations, completion of
medical forms, and tests requested by MA-only disability review teams must be
paid by the local agency. Reimbursement is available for these services as an
administrative expense in accordance with section
609.5
(b) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
360-5.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
